title: Crystal Glass Salt and Pepper Shakers Set, Set of 3 Crushed Diamond Storage Canister with Mirror Tray, Kitchen Bling Salt Pepper Jar Container Pot for Countertop, Home Decor, Dining Room, Gift(Silver)

It is suitable for placing in living room, , party, wedding, centerpiece, and it is the perfect addition to your sparkling life. Also, it is a great gift for your friends or family at weddings, birthdays, parties, Valentines dates, Christmas, Thanksgiving and housewarming parties.

【Worry-free shopping experience】For all customers who buy our dimond salt jars, we will provide friendly customer service and promise to do our best to solve your problems. If you encounter any product problems, please feel free to contact us via order information or email. We will get back to you within 24 hours.
